textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here This campus is so GREAT! The people are spectacular and the professors know your name and treat you like a friend. I have no complaints! Am learning a lot The professors here are great at what they do! I come from a pretty studious background, and many people thought college would be way too easy for me, but I am being challenged every day, and constantly learn new things! Login to rate or flag the reviews Erica from Pontotoc, MS 08/03/2011 Reviewer is A past student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 2 of 49 Categories Comments Bang for the buck For being a small private college its cost in inexpensive but for the average student just looking for a good school, the price is a little steep and expect to take out loans if you can't score a very pricey scholarship.
